name: UBOMI SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Kerauno Consultants Private Limited (KCPL) is creating a consultancy that is taking a birds eye view of the entire industry and creating solutions that have a 3600 impact. This approach allows KCPL to operate in the fields of: 

i. Content Creation

ii. Technology Solutions

iii. Analytics (for brands and influencers)

iv. Social commerce frameworks and plug-ins.

As part of its journey KCPL will work with multiple companies serving the influencer economy and provide solutions ranging from growth consulting to turnkey implementation of technology and advanced analytics.

The 30,000 ft. view of the industry helps KCPL identify technology solutions from related and unrelated fields and bring them to bear on the companies in the influencer space. This very holistic approach, which is very distinct from one-size-fits-all approach of most firms in the business. In the influencer economy a jack of all trades is truly a master of none.
name: KERAUNO CONSULTANTS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Last Decimal is an India-based IT solutions provider founded in April 2012 with offices in Pune, Mumbai and Bangalore. Our key focus areas are Insurance, Cloud Computing and Mobility.


We believe that technology is for everyone â€“ even if you do not have deep pockets. Our aim is to bring advances in technology like cloud computing and mobility to every business in the financial services space.


Our product offerings are cloud based. They require no infrastructure investment from the customer. We help our customers grow and we grow with them. Our solutions are geography and language independent. Our customers are in India and the Middle East, and range from MNC Banks to successful Insurance Brokers to passionate Corporate and Individual distributors.


We strongly believe what we do matters. We are passionate about our work, inspired by the impact it has on our business and our customers. Founded by insurance and technology professionals, Last Decimal has over 60 years of experience in the insurance sector. Its vast expertise in technology complements its global and India-centric knowledge in the field of insurance. Specializing in emerging technologies to help various insurance stakeholders in achieving their objectives, we design approaches that will redefine traditional models and enhance the role of Insurance distributors in modern times. To know more about our products and services contact us
name: Last Decimal
